property.name: functionInstalledSql
property.value: select count(*) from syscat.functions where funcname = '$(functionName)'

entry.value: CREATE FUNCTION fn_sym_blob_to_string(data BLOB) RETURNS varchar(32672) BEGIN ATOMIC return null; END
CREATE FUNCTION fn_sym_transaction_id() RETURNS varchar(100) BEGIN ATOMIC return null; END

property.name: stringColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias)."$(columnName)" is null then '' else '"' || replace(replace($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)",'\','\\'),'"','\"') || '"' end ||','||

property.name: clobColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias)."$(columnName)" is null then '' else '"' || cast($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)" as varchar(32672)) || '"' end ||','||

property.name: numberColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias)."$(columnName)" is null then '' else '"' || trim(char($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)")) || '"' end ||','||

property.name: datetimeColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias)."$(columnName)" is null then '' else '"' || rtrim(char(year(timestamp_iso($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)"))))||'-'||substr(digits(month(timestamp_iso($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)"))),9)||'-'||substr(digits(day(timestamp_iso($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)"))),9)||' '||substr(digits(hour(timestamp_iso($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)"))),9)||':'||substr(digits(minute(timestamp_iso($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)"))),9)||':'||substr(digits(second(timestamp_iso($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)"))),9)||'.'||rtrim(char(microsecond(timestamp_iso($(tableAlias)."$(columnName)")))) || '"' end ||','||

entry.value: CREATE TRIGGER $(triggerName) AFTER INSERT ON $(schemaName)$(tableName) REFERENCING NEW AS NEW FOR EACH ROW MODE DB2SQL BEGIN ATOMIC IF $(syncOnInsertCondition) and $(syncOnIncomingBatchCondition) then INSERT into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data (table_name, event_type, trigger_hist_id, row_data, create_time) VALUES('$(targetTableName)', 'I', $(triggerHistoryId), $(columns), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP); INSERT into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data_event (node_id, data_id, channel_id, transaction_id) SELECT node_id, $(defaultSchema)IDENTITY_VAL_LOCAL(), '$(channelName)', $(txIdExpression) from $(prefixName)_node c where (c.node_group_id = '$(targetGroupId)' and c.sync_enabled = 1 and ($(defaultSchema)sync_node_disabled is null or $(defaultSchema)sync_node_disabled != c.node_id)) $(nodeSelectWhere); END IF; END

CREATE TRIGGER $(triggerName) AFTER UPDATE ON $(schemaName)$(tableName) REFERENCING OLD AS OLD NEW AS NEW FOR EACH ROW MODE DB2SQL BEGIN ATOMIC IF $(syncOnUpdateCondition) and $(syncOnIncomingBatchCondition) then INSERT into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data (table_name, event_type, trigger_hist_id, create_time) VALUES('$(targetTableName)', 'U', $(triggerHistoryId), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP); INSERT into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data_event (node_id, data_id, channel_id, transaction_id) SELECT node_id, $(defaultSchema)IDENTITY_VAL_LOCAL(), '$(channelName)', $(txIdExpression) from $(prefixName)_node c where (c.node_group_id = '$(targetGroupId)' and c.sync_enabled = 1 and ($(defaultSchema)sync_node_disabled is null or $(defaultSchema)sync_node_disabled != c.node_id)) $(nodeSelectWhere); END IF; END

CREATE TRIGGER $(triggerName) AFTER DELETE ON $(schemaName)$(tableName) REFERENCING OLD AS OLD FOR EACH ROW MODE DB2SQL BEGIN ATOMIC IF $(syncOnDeleteCondition) and $(syncOnIncomingBatchCondition) then INSERT into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data (table_name, event_type, trigger_hist_id, pk_data, create_time) VALUES ('$(targetTableName)', 'D', $(triggerHistoryId), $(oldKeys), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP); INSERT into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data_event (node_id, data_id, channel_id, transaction_id) SELECT node_id, $(defaultSchema)IDENTITY_VAL_LOCAL(), '$(channelName)', $(txIdExpression) from $(prefixName)_node c where (c.node_group_id = '$(targetGroupId)' and c.sync_enabled = 1 and ($(defaultSchema)sync_node_disabled is null or $(defaultSchema)sync_node_disabled != c.node_id)) $(nodeSelectWhere); END IF; END
